text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.B.DE115Sexual transmissionHIV probable route of transmission* - Sexual transmission
    HIV.B.DE116Transmission through sharing of needles and syringesHIV probable route of transmission* - Transmission through sharing of needles and syringes
    HIV.B.DE117Mother-to-child transmissionHIV probable route of transmission* - Mother-to-child transmission
    HIV.B.DE118Transmission through blood transfusionHIV probable route of transmission* - Transmission through blood transfusion
